summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Brooklyn Avenue and Fourteenth Avenue Northeast, each from East Fifty-sixth Street to East Fifty-eighth Street; University Boulevard and East Fifty-eighth Street, from Brooklyn Avenue to Fifteenth Avenue Northeast, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, in accordance with Resolution No. 535 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
